---
title: "DataExploration"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
spanish1 <- read_csv("data/Acceptability-w-Demographics-Batch-1 - Sheet1.csv") #, skip = 1) 

# Rename first few metadata columns
spanish1 <- spanish1 %>% rename_at(vars(X1:X8), ~ c("Notes", "seq", "rating", "participant", "list", "order", "condition", "condition_type")) 

# Select first two rows to check Q#-question correspondance
spanish1 %>% slice(1)
```


```{r}
# Remove non-data rows
spanish1 <- spanish1 %>% filter(Notes != "Notes") %>% filter(participant != "Testing")

glimpse(spanish1)
head(spanish1)

View(spanish1)
```

```{r}
# Check some stuff
length(unique(spanish1$participant))
unique(spanish1$participant)
colnames(spanish1)
```
